name: Backpressure Configuration Settings
description: Configures options related to the backpressure logger, including Redis server, port, timeout, persistence, and user credentials.
summary: This configuration file defines various options for setting up and configuring the backpressure logger, including Redis server details and optional persistence settings.

backpressure-logger-redis-server.name: Redis Server for Backpressure Logger
backpressure-logger-redis-server.description: Specify the Redis server for backpressure logger.

backpressure-logger-redis-port.name: Redis Port for Backpressure Logger
backpressure-logger-redis-port.description: Specify the Redis port for backpressure logger.

backpressure-logger-redis-timeout.name: Redis Timeout for Backpressure Logger
backpressure-logger-redis-timeout.description: Specify the Redis timeout for backpressure logger.

backpressure-logger-redis-persistent.name: Enable Redis Persistence for Backpressure Logger
backpressure-logger-redis-persistent.description: Enable Redis persistence for backpressure logger.

backpressure-logger-redis-db.name: Redis DB for Backpressure Logger
backpressure-logger-redis-db.description: Specify the Redis DB number for backpressure logger.

backpressure-logger-redis-password.name: Redis Password for Backpressure Logger
backpressure-logger-redis-password.description: Specify the Redis password for backpressure logger.

backpressure-logger-redis-user.name: Redis User for Backpressure Logger
backpressure-logger-redis-user.description: Specify the Redis user for backpressure logger.

backpressure-logger-id-prefix.name: Backpressure Logger ID Prefix
backpressure-logger-id-prefix.description: Specify a prefix for the backpressure logger ID.
